text:
Aur be IC/Bapun Bhai/Rocky bhaiya tmhare liye kya hi likheğŸ˜‚. Wqt wqt pr bade bhai jaise gyan dete ho - madad karte ho aur dusre wqt saanp jaisi harkat bhi krte ho (kabhi party nahi diye hmko. Hmse na jaane kitni leliyeğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚) koi ni bhai ho apne.
Memories ki shuruaat hoti h December 2017 se jab SAE k liye ruke the winters m. Tm powertrain wale, hm aero wale. Hmara Odisha k log s bada puraana naata h, ek bachpan ka best friend Odisha ka tha. Aur yaha aaye to tm bhi achche dost bn gaye. Saath mil kr Mohit ko roast krne m bada maza aata h. Khair wo deserve krta h.[1]
([1] when Mohit reads this he will say - "bhag panda teri to")
Hm bahut log k gym jaane k inspiration rh chuke h. Bahut log ka gym jaana shuru krwaye h. Tmhara bhi shayad hmne hi shuru krwaya thağŸ˜‚ yaad nahi ab. Koi ni events pr bhaari saaman uthane k liye log chahiye hi hote h tm unhi m gine jaate hoğŸ˜‚
Goa chale the event m. Apni gaadi k liye sbki feelings ek hi frequency pr tuned thi ki Chaapna h. Chaapa tha bhi. Waha hm tmlog k sath wale room m nhi rh paaye Mohit rone lag gaya tha. Hmko daya aa gayi[1]. Wo subah shaam gaadi p kaam krna. Sb log ka shift wise sona. Hm tmko apna chashma diye the (jiske liye sb ld rhe the) ğŸ˜‚. Beach pr maza krna. Tmhare baap ka mst statue banaya gaya tha. Side m khade old uncle bda appreciate kr rhe the useğŸ˜‚ 
Hmara apni wing m aur kch dost log s pact tha No GPL wala. Hmko yaad h à¤¸à¤¨à¥ 2019 m tm hmare birthday pr Arihant k sath aaye the. Bda room bajakr nirash ho k chale gaye.ğŸ˜‚ Hm tmko bahut party diye h yaha tk tmhare H12 aane ki khushi m bhi. Saath m Hitanshu ko tmne aur mne kbhi nhi di ğŸ˜‚. (Ab to covid ka bahana  bhi h) . Ek baar tmko KGF dekhna tha. Koi nahi aa rha the tmhare saath. Hm aa gaye the tb company deneğŸ˜‚. 
Our friendship developed on multiple fronts whether be it parties, or Mohit-roasting[1] or classes or bakchodi. Wo workshop pr maza krna-Wo Central workshop m kaam krna-  Wo late night Doaa canteen aur CCD (ye ccd ka kissa yaad h! Hm baaki log ko jalane k liye ccd m khilaye theğŸ˜‚) -Wo hall 5 ka TV room ki bakchodi -Wo Hall13 ka introductory phase- Wo Mech profs k lectures- BB ka class saath m chod kr jaate the chai peene ğŸ˜‚ - Wo discord ka voice chat ğŸ˜‚. Wo google home k liye tmlog ka convincing. ğŸ˜‚(Lelena hmse kbhi milo to) Bahut memories h. Kitna bataye. Bahut bakchodi ki h saath m. Aur milenge tb krenge. Abhi to hm ek saal aur h. Possibly aur memories banayenge campus m. Fir bhi yaad karte rahenge
Tmhare ğŸ¼
author: Parth  Luwaria

text:
Ohhhh Bhaaai, 
One of the best friendships developed at IITK. One person whom I can really really trust. You are more like an elder brother to me. 
Some of our memories together - 
Hmare thane (E512) m tm Pandey, hm Bajirao aur Nipun havaldaar hua krta thağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. 
Waise to hm nahi darte h, par us din you got me. (#Bloodyà¤®à¥‡à¤°à¥€). btw, BKL b dr gaya thağŸ˜‚
E512 (7-RCR) m kabutar ka romance. 
Nipun k sath prankğŸ˜‚. Pehle hm msg kiye fir tm kiye fir hm kiye aur tmne BKL s pucha kaa be muskura rhe ho? Nipun be like- bhai koi h. Us be like - Ohhh bhaaai Ohhh bhaaai Chaapa. CongratsğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
First year m Shivam ko maggie party s block krne k liye Saavan Gang ka gathan kia tha.
Kitni baar hm aur Nipun class k liye nikal gaye room lock krke aur baad m pata chalta tm naha rhe the.
Wing m sbhi room k baahar swastik bana kr bure saaye ko bhagana ğŸ˜‚
Wo Loco party @ CCD
Mujhe GPL s bachane wala contract.
Tmhara wo chal be Canteen/ Canteen chalega. Hm to hmesha aate the ğŸ˜‚
Second year ki bakchodi. One thing I regret is that I couldn't make your CAD for TA. Gaadi banane m lg gaye the. Proper birthday parties to second year s shuru hui thi. @CCD or @Dominos or @MacD. Time kaise nikal gaya pata hi nahi chala. Third year aaya, bahut bakchodi ki. Tmhari intern party, fir PPO wali party.  Fir Covid aa gaya. Ghr pr mn nahi laga to aagaye tm se milne Lucknow.
Itne kisse h ki likh nhi paa rhe. Sach m bahut bakchodi ki h. Wo jignad ki roasting. Some Commonly used slangs - tum to badi tez ho be, aur be, chaapa, ohhh bhaaai.
At IITK, far from my home, I never felt homesick. I knew I have two brothers here who are always there for me. Although this is not a parting away story just a beginning to a lifelong friendship.
Covid khtm hote hi trip pr milte h.
Hmesha yaad karte rhenge, 
Tmhare Partho
author: Parth  Luwaria

text:
Adde bhai,
My first year NSS ka saathiğŸ˜‚ - fir gym guru -aur padosi -aur pizza buddy.
I was always the third person enjoying you being roasted by Shivam and Pandey. ğŸ˜‚( Wo raat yaad rahegi {Deepesh} +{ABCXYZ} = {ABCesh} or {DeepXYZ}. Ab ABCXYZ k itne naam leliye the kya bataye.
Hm dono ki cycle pr shani ka saaya tha pr jaise taise nikaal liye 4 saal. Second year summers m hm dono saath m jale the Kanpur ki garmi mğŸ˜‚. Although Cooler tha but jugaad krte rhte the. Wo chipkali ko heat gun s bhagana yaad h! Bahut maza aaya tha. ğŸ˜‚. I always felt like the office congratulations meme with everyone congratulating me for passing you in NSS. Me who was bored and wanted to go out and get some air. Bahut bakchodi peli h saath m. Aur pelenge corona khtm hone do. Best wishes for future.
Tmhara Partho
author: Parth  Luwaria

text:
Pyare mitr Jay!
Tm hmare bachpan wale mitr ke roomie rhe ho. Usi ki vjh s tmse mile the. Fir hmare priy buchaas ki wing m the. Hm jb bhi wing visit pr aate the tmhari, bada apnapan sa lagta tha. Tm sabhi bahut hi km samy m bahut hi achche mitr ban gaye. Ye sb SAE wale hmko panda hmari qualities ki vjh s bulate the, dheere dheere hmara figure bhi vaisa ho gaya ğŸ˜‚ Poster banana koi badi baat nahi hoti h, ye to tm jaan hi gaye honge. Hmse achche bana lete ho. Lekin uski jo treat lene m maza aata h, wo tm shayd nahi smjh paao. Tmko pakde the hm treat k liye yaad h canteen m. 
Psychology wala course yaad h, tmko usme bhi pakade the hm CCD lejane k liyeğŸ˜‚. Tm unexpectedly le bhi gaye the LOL.ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
Movie dekhne jaana ho ya fir Lucknow trip ho, bahut maza kiya h tm log k sath. Lucknow second time jb gaye the apne roomie se milne, tb ghumne ka mn nhi kr rha tha. Tm poora ghuma diye ho .Tum log ko bada miss karte h. Sach m. Jaisa ki Fufa ko hm bole, I know, tm log trip plan to karoge hi, haalat sudharne k paschat, hmko bhi include kr lena usme.
Yaad karte rahenge
Tmhare ğŸ¼
author: Parth  Luwaria

text:
My first friend at IITK - My bhai at IITK, who taught me all the bakchodi of which I will be always thankful.(pata nahi hm 4th year tk waise hi seedhe rhte to kya hota? ğŸ˜‚   )
Sharing a common love for Udaipur, you were always the person to go to whenever I felt homesick (1st year) , sad, or stressed. Jb koi bhi Canteen sath naa chalta ho, tb tum chalte the. Sath m hm dono n wazan badhaya. Bs tmne ghatate wqt dhokha de diya. (Ab mummy bolti h seekh Kartik seğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚)
Wo train m saath m ghar aana. (Common shared love for Chittor station poha and pakoras)
Wo Pandey k sath General Knowledge pr tmko roast krna ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
Wo Rassam m Rajasthani thali wali b'day party
Hm kabhi naache nahi the, tm hmko Antaragni m nacha diyeğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
Hmari svargiya (ğŸ™) cycle pr sath m jaana. (Tmhari cycle jaisi hi dikhti thi isliye mention kr rhe hğŸ˜‚)
........... and the list of such memories go on and on and many more to come as this is just a beginning to an everlasting friendship.
author: Parth  Luwaria

text:
Bhai Mohit, tm yaar bade bakchod mitr ho hmare. ğŸ˜‚. Tm hm sb log k chotu ho. Bade seedhe aadmi bhi ho. IC s ladne k liye sada tat pr rhte ho. Hm jb bhi bor hote h, tmlog ka ldai bada enjoy krte h. Kabhi tmhari side lekr IC ki maarna. Kabhi vice versa."Bhag Panda teri to" bol diye honge ab tk to.
Goa m jo tm bed k liye roye the. Aaj bhi yaad h hmko. Usse bada r rona nhi dekha kabhi ğŸ˜‚. Koi ni hm badhappan dikha kr tmko wo bed dediye the. Goa ki bakchodi kya hi ginaye. Bahut bakchodi ki h workshop pr bhi. Ab zyada kch yaad to nhi itna samay ho gaya h. Tm hamesha s IC k sath magte the. rarely(shayd ek baar hi) hm tm log k sath chalte the, but ab sochte h jaana chahiye tha aur memories bn jati. Koi ni. wo workshop pr bakchodi krna. Central workshop pr kaam krna, Late night DoAA canteen, CCD pr treats, Airstrip pr gaadi daudana, bahut maza kiya h sath m. Log maan jaate to possibly hm log ek aur trip pr jaate. Hm to poora tayyari kr liye the but last m sb saanp log kat liye to hm kya hi krte, itna door s aana rhta aur koi nhi aa rha tha. Pr koi nhi. Covid khtm hote hi ek trip pr chalenge.koi nhi aaye to hm dono hi chal lenge. Suna h tm bade heavy trekker ho. Best of luck for future. Waqt sudharte hi milenge.
Tmhare ğŸ¼
author: Parth  Luwaria

text:
à¤ªà¥à¤°à¤¿à¤¯ à¤¬à¤šà¤ªà¤¨ à¤•à¥‡ à¤®à¤¿à¤¤à¥à¤°
Tmhara kya hi kehna. Tm to apne purane bhai ho "Old is Gold". Kuch memories likh dete h  -
Class 7th m (shayad) tmse mile the. Bade km samay m bade achche mitr bn gaye the. School Ground k rightmost side wali stairs pr bhojan ka luft uthate the. Same tuition jaate the.
Ek baar Assembly krni thi saath m. Tb pehli baar mulakaat hui thi hmari Lucy se.ğŸ˜‚ Bada daudati thi wo hmkoğŸ˜‚ Shayad tmhari training m kami rh gayi ki hmko nhi daudaye.ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
Tmko ek baar hmko copy deni thi hm tmko pure shahr ka naksha bana kr dediye the ghr tk pahuchne k liye (pre-google maps era) ğŸ˜‚ I didn't know back then ki itna drafter chalana hoga future m. Kch photographs h shayad hmare pass school time k. Bhejenge kabhi. Us samay Facebook naya naya tha. Hm tmko12 baje wish kiye the. Shayad pehli baar messenger p wish bhi tmko hi kia tha.ğŸ˜‚
Fir ek din tmne bataya ki tm jaa rhe ho. Bada dukh hua tha hmko. Kch din tk mn nhi laga.
Samay nikla hm IITK aaye fir ek din dekhte h lift m saamne ye jaana pehchaana vyakti kon h. ğŸ˜‚
Do bichde dost mil gaye wapas ğŸ”¥
Tmhari wing ki kya hi baat kare. Hmare MechBois ka jalwa hğŸ”¥ğŸ˜‚ Apni C4 wing k baad m tmhari wing k partial member bn gaye theğŸ˜‚ Saath m ghume bhi h kayi jagah. Badi bakchodi kiye h tmlog k saath.
Ab fir waqt aaya h aage bdhne ka, apne jeevan pustak bharne ka. Nayi raah pr chalne ka. Dua karte h bahut chaapo tum. Best wishes for future. 
Yaad karte rahenge.

text:
O BKL Draams/Hall/Taekwondo walo n ..............
Aur be mitr - bhai - roomie - Aloevera - meri fake ID ka diwana/victim - mess wala - marwadi bhaisa (Not buffalo) - TAuaa wale (Ye hm nahi maante kyunki hm 2 saal drafter chalaye h)ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Aise to badi memories h pr kch likh hi dete h - 
Chaar saal pehle mile the, saath m classes jaana(Room lock krke when Pandey bathğŸ˜‚). L20 k middle section k peeche wale block m 4thi 5vi seedhi pr line s poora wing soya krta thağŸ˜‚. 
Tmko Taekwondo jaata dekh badi daya aati thi hmko. Hmare thane(E512) k tm hawaldaar jo the. Bada kaata h tmhara fake ID sğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ 
Bhai hm to dare the us din, Lekin tum zyada dare the. Bs tm uchal nahi paaye kyunki tmhara weight (us samay) mujhse zyada tha aur tm pnkhe k neeche the to air resistance bhi rha hoga. Jo bhi tha tm zyada dare the.ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
Canteen ka sukh to baad m aaya tha but room pr chana chor banakar khate the
Us waqt tmhari GK subhanallah. Bada maza aata tha jb Pandey tmko roast krta tha.
O BKL aaj pdhenge beth k. Cleans Study table - set books and copy properly. - A FEW MOMENTS LATER - Wo shaks ajeeb mudra m kursi pr shayan krta paaya gaya.
Tmhari campaigning kiye the. Tmko pata nahi ek baat ab batate h - Tmhari jb HEC dvara li jaa rhi thi, tb hm hmari ek fake id s election officer ko inform krke waha bhej diye the. Although wo kch nahi kia jo kehna h kaho, bachaye the tmko.
bahut memories h kya batayein
Roomie bhai. I have got the best ever roomies. Kabhi tm log s koi shikayat nahi hui. Koi duvidha aai to tm log s batiya lo. Cooler liye the. But yaad h summers m hm uske aage duct laga kr khud hawa lete theğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. 
Mess secy roomie k faayde kya hi bataye. Rhne dete h galat prabhav padega. But bhai eternal thanks for dal baati. Dal baati is lub. Taste hi sahi khilaye the tm second year m. 
Second year hm dono n bahut parishram kia, tmne draams m, hmne sae m. Dono karmath yuvao ko pragati mili aur apne apne events m jaa kr aaye.
Ek baat h tmko gariyane ki, hmko jo tm Chitral k poster banane m fasaye the. bc raat raat jagaya gaya tha mujhe. Wo treat bhi nahi diye hmko. (raaz ki baat - hm vote bhi nahi diyeğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ mazaak kr rhe h). pr koi ni seh liya thoda
Jaipur ghum kr kya maza aaya. Bahut maza aaya bayaan nhi kr skte.
After family, agr koi h to wo hmare mitr log h. You guys (You, Abhyuday) hold a very important role in my life. 4 saal ki memories ye yearbook h, but our friendship is everlasting. 
Yaad krte rahenge.
Tmhare Partho
author: Parth  Luwaria

text:
Bhrata pranam!
Tmhare pass hm zyadatar dept ka r ronanlekr aate h. Khair apna dept h hi itna bakchod. Lab reports ka jugaad s le kr kisi teesre aadmi k liye assignment ka jugaad. Sb kr ke dekh liye. Ab thesis jugaad do ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Nahi zyada popular ho jayenge wo krke. Rhne do. From Mech labs to online sem, we have seen it all together. Bahut sare courses sath m jhele h. Koi ni bhai jeevan h chalte rahega. Bakchodi krte rahenge aur memories banate rahenge.
Sada chaapte rho
author: Parth  Luwaria

text:
Piyush bhai!
We have a lot in common. Both likes aero and chassis. dono n bahut saare courses saath m kiye h. Almost everytime tm hi help krte ho. We both know the pain of meshing. Lol. Both agree on the fact ki Arihant faaltu m r-rona karta h, And many more. Goa wala event apne m ek poora memoir h. tm jo bamboo wale bed pr parabola banaye theğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Hmare pass aaj bhi wo pic padi h. Ab to shayad hm bhi bana de.
Bro you are a man of honour. Lagbhag 2-3 courses aise honge, jo tmhare bagair hm itna achcha nahi nikal skte the. 634 to hm tmhare bharose hi liye the.  ab to ek saal aur nikaalna h bs. All the best bro. I know whatever you do, you would do the best. Tm SAE k ek karmsheel member ho. Hm kabhi tmko fraud maarte nahi dekhe h. Best wishes.
author: Parth  Luwaria

text:
Priy draams wale mitr,
Hmara draaams k prati rukh sada s hi kathor raha h. pehla kaaran to BKL h. Usne Oh BKL(Nipun) draams walo n G maardi itni baar bola h ki hm psychologically conditioned ho gaye h ki draams m rh kr uski mar gayi. Dusra kaaran tmhare kch seniors h ğŸ˜‚ jinhone mujhe manifesto banane ki treat nahi diğŸ˜‚ Teesra hm h. Kon itna mehnat parishram kare, hall k chakkr kaatna, chillana, fir s chakkar kaatna aur chillana. Koi ni pr is memoir m achcha likhte h. Draams wale mitro k faayde - 1. Tm log bhai mehnati hote ho, lab reports banwana ho to bana dete ho. baaki yaad nahi aa rhe.  Vaise to Mech m sath m hase aur roye h dono. Kayi labs m lab partners bhi rahe h. Heat Transfer wali lab yaad h. Lab ko jaldi s khtm karke. Canteen s chips aur samosa chai le kr agli class jaate the. 
TAuaa lab m bc FLYING DRAGON banaye theğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. badi mehnat krke weld aur brazing ki thi chote parts ki. Last m check krte waqt bc chal hi nahi rha tha. Fati padi thi. side m tel ki bottle was a God's miracle. bc tel daalte hi makhkhan ki trh chal rha.
Yaad ho to check krne k baad usko full speed se chalakr check bhi kiye the nahi toota tha.
8th sem almost saare courses same the hm logo k. Pehle to wo course ki baat krenge jo hm dono n drop kiyağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. jo weekly r rona tha usme. Achcha h drop kr diye. Uske alawa saare courses saath m kr liye achche s. Adv cfd nikaal liye jaise taiseğŸ˜‚. Koi ni ye course ka R Rona to chalta rahega. Mitr tm bakchod ho. Aasha karte h ki bakchod hi bane raho. Best wishes for future....
PS wo faayde bahut h, hmko yaad nahi aa rhe filhaal kyunki filhaal 401 ka makeup chal rha hğŸ˜‚
author: Parth  Luwaria

text:
Priy Priyakhee!
Tmse hm inspiration lete the kaam karne ka aur class attend karne kağŸ˜‚. Hamari gaadi to nahi bn paayi pr bahut maza kiya h designing m. Sabse pehle to chassis designing tk hm masti krte the sb kaam karte the, kyunki uske baad hi hmara bodyworks ka kaam shuru ho skta tha. Bhale Shukla ya Ritik ki bitching krni ho. ya fir kisi k sath prank krna ho. Bada maza kiya h tmhare sath. Chassis ki meshing krne ka dard hm samajh sakte hğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Fir tm log n final krdi Chassis. Hmne ek week m bodyworks design final krdi. Material selection aur Manufacturing process dekhne m alag dhandhali thi.ğŸ˜‚ Tm honeycomb selection wala kaam kr rhi thi, aur m CF vendors ko laalach dikha rha tha (Laalach kyunki 30m^2 CF bahut paisa hota h). Bahut chill maara h sath me. Hall 5 TV room, Reading room, Central Workshop, Library. Bahut brainstorming ki h sath m. Hm tum aur Shahid dimaag ghum jaata tha, Aluminium chassis aur CF bodypanels m.
Mostly saari classes m hm sae wale log sath m bethte the. JRK wali class to epic. jaldi aa jate the thoda to JRK k sath discussion krne beth jaate the kbhi kbhi.ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ Assignments ho ya lab reports hamesha madad ki h tumne. 
Wo small scale carbon fiber ka prototype yaad h, jo m, tm aur Shahid banaye the. First hands on experience tha carbon fiber k sath tm log ka.  Bs chakka lagane ki deri thi and voila, ek bachche ka khilona ban jaatağŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ Strong and expensive toy. 
Hm sb bahut treats pr gaye h. DoAA canteen, hall canteen, CCD, ramaiiya, farewell pr jaha chale the(Naam bhool gaye hm us jagah ka). Un sb m best to hmko wo lagti h jb M, Shahid aur tm room pr chana chor bana kr khaye the aur Jitesh ko photo bhej kr jalaye theğŸ˜‚ Alag s mess m jaakr vegies laye the. Mess worker bhi soch rhe the aaj bhaiya ko kya ho gya.ğŸ˜‚ Central workshop ka AC summer stay ko 5star kr deta tha. Jaldi aao aur late jaao. Aur waha beth kr ek taraf netflix dusre taraf solidworks/ansys. ğŸ˜‚ Bahut miss karte h un dino ko - tm sab ko. Bahut memories banayi h sath m. Wo yaad h CCD se wapas aate waqt ek puppy peeche pd gaya tha. Jaha jaate waha aa rha tha. Fir hm log strategically usko dusre dogs k area m le gaye aur wo bhaag gayağŸ˜‚ Whether it be SAE, Mech Labs or courses, or treats or market m material lene jaana(Ye hmko bilkul pasand nahi tha) bahut bakchodi ki h sath m. tmhare bio m ek baat pdh kr thoda dukh hua. Koi aisa vyakti ho jo aisa bolta ho to humko batana, dekh lenge usko. Lockdown m vaise bhi bahut pehelwan ho gaye h. You Shahid and me (Saini bhi tha) will always make a team. My journey at IITK is incomplete without you. We saw a dream and worked together to make our car, pragun. You were going to be our lightest driver. (For that you needed to gain some weight ). Best of luck.
-Parth

A person with a lot of similarities and that connects us (Baad m kbhi miloge tb aur similarities bn jayengi ğŸ˜‚). Never had such a bonding with any other person. From working on what Ankit told us to do - to chilling out and bunking club meetings together, bahut bakchodi kari h saath m.

author: Parth  Luwaria

text:
Badal Bhai! 
You are one of the most trustworthy person, I met at IITK. A best friend indeed. Some memories down our lane -
First year k shuruaat m hm aur Pandey bade confused rhte the tm me aur Arihant m. ğŸ˜‚. Tm log ko baad m jaise jaise jaanne lage. waise waise samajhte gaye differences. Saath m Lecture hall jaate the. Wo L20 k mid section ki last wali stairs yaad rahengi.Hm hamesha tmhare pass betha karte the taki tm jaga do hmko biometric aane prğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ Hm log ka PE bhi sath hota tha. dukh dard k sathi hğŸ˜‚ ğŸ˜‚ ğŸ˜‚ 
Udghosh wali trip yaad h. Trip kyunki ghum kr hi to aaye the green park stadium (M,tm,Nipun,Shivam) ğŸ˜‚ koi kaam to nahi tha. 
Hm bhai bada special feel karte the jo tm hmko kuch raaz ki baat batate rhte the. Ab raaz ki baat yaha kaha daaleğŸ˜‚. Tmhari first year s bandi k kisse pure wing m prakhyat the. Although hm vegetarian h, tmhara chicken ka tyaag was appreciating. Mtlb kon hi dekhta tha but fir bhi. (bhabhi ji ko virtual pranam!) Tmhare Haryanvi roomie ki kya baat kare.  Hm regret krte hğŸ˜, First year Antaragni m usko uchal kr catch nhi kr paaye. Khair apne part ka gpl samajh liye hm vaise bhi nahi lete.
Bhai tm, Kartik, Vipul, Arihant k sath hm Antaragni Techkriti bada enjoy kiye. I remember I was very shy and introvert when I came to IITK. You guys transformed me and Bakchodified me. ğŸ˜‚ Aaj hm itne bakchod tm log ki vajah s h
Wo Holi yaad h. LOL hm aaj sochte h hm khud s to nahi hi jaate. Tm log hi mujhe le gaye the and I should thank you for that.
Tm hmesha mitro k liye tat pr rhte ho. Badal bhai canteen chaloge - chalo. Badal bhai shop C chaloge - chalo. Bakchod ho bhai tm. Pi day wala kissa yaad h.  Free pizza 4 digits s rh gaya tha. bc bakchodi thi us din bhiğŸ˜‚ . 
Bhai second year B'day party at Rasam yaad h. Kitna maza kiye the hm log. Hmne Kanpur m jannat khoj li. Ek mewadi aadmi ko daal baati mil jaye aur kya chahiye. Aur apne case m to hm aur Kartik do aadmi the. ğŸ˜‚Hm bahut khush h ki wo pal hmne tm log k sath bitaye. 
Bahut maza kiya h sath m. Bakchodi ki h tm log k sath. 
koi ni samay theek hote hi apna friends reunion hogağŸ˜‚ Best wishes for future.
Yaad karte rahenge
Tmhare Parth
author: Parth  Luwaria

text:
Pranam bhai!
God aadmi ho bhaai tm. Na jane kitne assignments m help ki hogi. Ek reliable aur trustworthy mitr ho. Tmhare wing k sath bahut memories judi h. Free pizza party yaad h tmkoğŸ˜‚ kya planning ki thi. Samay ka balidaan diya pr ant m maza aaya. Kayi baar tmhare aur Buchas k sath classes k beech m canteen pr timepass bhi kia h. Bs itna aur kahenge wqt achcha ho ya bura, tm jaise mitr rhte h to emotional support rhta h fir chahe koi bhi problem ya anxiety rhe. Sada chaapte rho mitr. Stay in touch.
Tmhare Luwaria bhai
author: Parth  Luwaria

text:
Priy bhrata Vipul, tm bade heavy dancer ho! Hmko yaad h hmse black T shirt maangne aaye theğŸ˜‚. SAE wali tshirt thi but wo dance m nahi de sake (bada chahte the usko). LOL tmko vaise badi loose bhi rhti. hmari jo thiğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. First year s bade bakchod mitr rhe ho. Hm sirf first year ka Antaragni Techkriti enjoy kiye h. Hmko yaad h hm, tm, Badal bhai, aur Partho Techkriti m andhere m apne apne mobile s chehre pr light maar ke photo liye the. Hmare pass abhi bhi pdi h.ğŸ˜‚. Hm dono saath m Tank m bhi baithe the. Bs wo Tank chalana baaki tha.(Koi ni GTA m chala kr virtual experience prapt kr liye baad m) Those days were lit. Hm wing ki bakchodiyo m hm zyada shirkat nahi karte the. Bahut seemit logo k sang bakchodi krte the. Tm un khaas logo m se ho. Wing vibhajan k baad, hm regularly tmhari wing visit pr aate rhte the kabhi Arihant k pass ya kabhi Kartik k. Bada maza karte the sb. Abhi dekhte h roz pushups ka videos daalte ho. Achcha h. Shabash.ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚
P.S. Hm bhi bhootpoorv fitness freak rh chuke h. Nipun, Aaishi, ya Deepesh s puchnlena.
author: Parth  Luwaria

text:
Utkarsh bro!
Vaise to hm tumhare bed baapu h. Pr koi nhi bro!
Jis E512 m rh kr hmne IITK ko jaana aur explore kiya, usme tmse aur Buchaas s milne aate the. Us room ko hm log thaana bolte the. Jisme hm Singham, Pandey ji aur Nipun hawaldaar hua karta tha. Tmhara wing m hmko bada apnapan lagta tha. Hmare Bachpan wale mitr ki wing jo thi. Upr s hmare priy Buchasia ki wing. Sblog k sath bada bakchodi krte the hm. Yaad h jb bhi aaya krte the sblog ko hasaya karte the. 
Bro you are one of the best guy from chemical that I know of. Never seen such hardworking person like you. Tm log k sath Lucknow chale the. Bada maza kiye. Second time gaye to lag rha tha kya hi ghumenge, tm log k sath itna ghum to liye. MP ghumne aaye the tm log tb tmse mil nahi paaye. Mauka hi nahi mila. Koi ni. Samay theek hote hi, jo bhi tm log ki trip plan hogi, (coz I know for sure plan hogi ğŸ˜‚) usme hmko shamil kr lena. Best wishes.
Yaad karte rahenge.
Tmhare bed baapu ğŸ˜‚
author: Parth  Luwaria

text:
Bro tmhare sath mess m beth kr bahut productive aur bakchod discussions kiye. Shuruaat m tmhara naam nahi jaante the. ek baar club k kisi kaam s aaye the tmhare wing m. Tripathi ji s puch rhe the bhai Yogeshwar ko jaante ho. Tm usi k roomie nikle. Wo moment bada bakchod tha.ğŸ˜‚
Bade bakchod aadmi ho tm.
author: Parth  Luwaria
